objects.text:
• 100% Organic Certified
• Strawberry & Hibiscus Blend
• 25 Premium Tea Bags
• Rich in Antioxidants

product_details.name: Organic Strawberry Herb Bliss Tea - A Symphony of Sweet & Floral Flavors
product_details.description:
• 100% Organic certified premium tea blend
• Unique combination of strawberry and hibiscus with green tea base
• Contains 25 convenient tea bags per package
• Net weight: 50g of premium quality blend
• Beautiful artistic packaging with elegant strawberry design
• Perfect balance of fruity and floral notes
• Natural ingredients with no artificial additives
• Expertly crafted by Tea Mill for superior taste
• Ideal for both hot and iced tea preparations
• Eco-friendly resealable pouch maintains freshness
• Rich in antioxidants from green tea and hibiscus
• 'Love at first sip' guarantee
• Perfect for health-conscious tea enthusiasts
• Delightful pink-tinted brew when steeped

banner_details:
This tea product banner features a balanced, elegant layout with dual-tone blocks in the background, creating a soft and soothing visual effect. A high-resolution product image is prominently placed to the right. On the left, layered text elements include a bold, uppercase headline ("heading") in dark green, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in a muted rose tone. A handwritten-style tagline ("tagline") adds charm beneath the title. Below, a list ("description") communicates product features in a clean, sans-serif font. Price highlighting ("price") is bold and prominent, paired with a strong green rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") and text ("cta"). 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream: #F8F3E8  
- Light Rose: #F5D6D9  
- Soft Pink: #E8C2C5  
- Pale Beige: #F0E4D4  
- Moss Green: #2D5640  
- Accent Green: #4A7C59  
- Accent Pink: #D47383  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image utilizes a soft, natural color palette that conveys a sense of freshness and organic quality. The key colors include a muted blush pink (#D8A3B3) on the top background with floral hibiscus illustrations, blending into a cream-beige (#F5EEE6) base. The strawberry is highlighted in a vivid red (#D62828) with subtle gradients, catching the viewer’s attention instantly. Leaf details use shades of gray (#AAB0B2) to provide contrast without overpowering the design. The green shade used in the logo and text (#2D6B45) reinforces the product's organic identity. For an advertisement banner, this palette ensures harmony and emphasis through natural yet appealing tones.
